verses.verse: וַיְהִ֧י <WH1961> had been אֲרוֹן־ <WH727> And the ark יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD בִּשְׂדֵ֥ה <WH7704> was in the country פְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> of the Philistines שִׁבְעָ֥ה <WH7651> seven חֳדָשִֽׁים׃ <WH2320> months

וַיִּקְרְא֣וּ <WH7121> called פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <WH6430> And the Philistines לַכֹּהֲנִ֤ים <WH3548> for the priests וְלַקֹּֽסְמִים֙ <WH7080> and the diviners לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying מַֽה־ <WH4100> What נַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> What shall we do לַאֲר֣וֹן <WH727> to the ark יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Jehovah הוֹדִעֻ֕נוּ <WH3045> acknowledge בַּמֶּ֖ה <WH4100> how נְשַׁלְּחֶ֥נּוּ <WH7971> us wherewith we shall send לִמְקוֹמֽוֹ׃ <WH4725> it to his place

וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <WH559> And they said אִֽם־ <WH518> If מְשַׁלְּחִ֞ים <WH7971> If ye send away אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֨וֹן <WH727> the ark אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> of the God יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel אַל־ <WH408> nay תְּשַׁלְּח֤וּ <WH7971> send אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> רֵיקָ֔ם <WH7387> it not empty כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הָשֵׁ֥ב <WH7725> but in any wise תָּשִׁ֛יבוּ <WH7725> return ל֖וֹ אָשָׁ֑ם <WH817> him a trespass offering אָ֤ז <WH227> Then תֵּרָֽפְאוּ֙ <WH7495> then ye shall be healed וְנוֹדַ֣ע <WH3045> and it shall be known לָכֶ֔ם לָ֛מָּה <WH4100> why לֹא־ <WH3808> is not תָס֥וּר <WH5493> is not removed יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> to you why his hand מִכֶּֽם׃ <WH4480> they

וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <WH559> Then said מָ֣ה <WH4100> What הָאָשָׁם֮ <WH817> they What [shall be] the trespass offering אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which נָשִׁ֣יב <WH7725> which we shall return לוֹ֒ וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <WH559> to him? They answered מִסְפַּר֙ <WH4557> [according to] the number סַרְנֵ֣י <WH5633> of the lords פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> of the Philistines חֲמִשָּׁה֙ <WH2568> Five [עָפְלֵי כ] (טְחֹרֵ֣י <WH6076> stronghold ק) זָהָ֔ב <WH2091> golden וַחֲמִשָּׁ֖ה <WH2568> and five עַכְבְּרֵ֣י <WH5909> mice זָהָ֑ב <WH2091> golden כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מַגֵּפָ֥ה <WH4046> plague אַחַ֛ת <WH259> for one לְכֻלָּ֖ם <WH3605> all וּלְסַרְנֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH5633> [was] on you all and on your lords

וַעֲשִׂיתֶם֩ <WH6213> Wherefore ye shall make צַלְמֵ֨י <WH6754> images [עָפְלֵיכֶם כ] (טְחֹרֵיכֶ֜ם <WH6076> stronghold ק) וְצַלְמֵ֣י <WH6754> and images עַכְבְּרֵיכֶ֗ם <WH5909> of your mice הַמַּשְׁחִיתִם֙ <WH7843> that mar אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the land וּנְתַתֶּ֛ם <WH5414> and ye shall give לֵאלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> unto the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel כָּב֑וֹד <WH3519> glory אוּלַ֗י <WH194> perhaps יָקֵ֤ל <WH7043> peradventure he will lighten אֶת־ <WH853> יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> his hand מֵֽעֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5921> and וּמֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> and אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <WH430> from off you and from off your gods וּמֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> and אַרְצְכֶֽם׃ <WH776> and from off your land

וְלָ֤מָּה <WH4100> Why תְכַבְּדוּ֙ <WH3513> Wherefore then do ye harden אֶת־ <WH853> לְבַבְכֶ֔ם <WH3824> your hearts כַּאֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> after כִּבְּד֛וּ <WH3513> hardened מִצְרַ֥יִם <WH4713> Egyptian וּפַרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> and Pharaoh אֶת־ <WH853> לִבָּ֑ם <WH3820> care for הֲלוֹא֙ <WH3808> not כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> he הִתְעַלֵּ֣ל <WH5953> had severely בָּהֶ֔ם וַֽיְשַׁלְּח֖וּם <WH7971> among them did they not let the people go וַיֵּלֵֽכוּ׃ <WH1980> along

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now קְח֨וּ <WH3947> and take וַעֲשׂ֜וּ <WH6213> Now therefore make עֲגָלָ֤ה <WH5699> cart חֲדָשָׁה֙ <WH2319> new אֶחָ֔ת <WH259> a וּשְׁתֵּ֤י <WH8147> two פָרוֹת֙ <WH6510> kine עָל֔וֹת <WH5763> milch אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> which לֹא־ <WH3808> has never עָלָ֥ה <WH5927> on which there hath come עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> and עֹ֑ל <WH5923> no yoke וַאֲסַרְתֶּ֤ם <WH631> and tie אֶת־ <WH853> הַפָּרוֹת֙ <WH6510> the kine בָּעֲגָלָ֔ה <WH5699> to the cart וַהֲשֵׁיבֹתֶ֧ם <WH7725> and bring בְּנֵיהֶ֛ם <WH1121> their calves מֵאַחֲרֵיהֶ֖ם <WH310> from them הַבָּֽיְתָה׃ <WH1004> home

וּלְקַחְתֶּ֞ם <WH3947> And take אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD וּנְתַתֶּ֤ם <WH5414> and lay אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> on הָ֣עֲגָלָ֔ה <WH5699> it upon the cart וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <WH853> כְּלֵ֣י <WH3627> the jewels הַזָּהָ֗ב <WH2091> of gold אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which הֲשֵׁבֹתֶ֥ם <WH7725> which ye return לוֹ֙ אָשָׁ֔ם <WH817> him [for] a trespass offering תָּשִׂ֥ימוּ <WH7760> and put בָאַרְגַּ֖ז <WH712> in a coffer מִצִּדּ֑וֹ <WH6654> by the side וְשִׁלַּחְתֶּ֥ם <WH7971> thereof and send it away אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> וְהָלָֽךְ׃ <WH1980> that it may go

וּרְאִיתֶ֗ם <WH7200> And see אִם־ <WH518> if דֶּ֨רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way גְּבוּל֤וֹ <WH1366> of his own coast יַֽעֲלֶה֙ <WH5927> if it goeth up בֵּ֣ית שֶׁ֔מֶשׁ <WH1053> to Bethshemesh ה֚וּא <WH1931> He עָ֣שָׂה <WH6213> [then] he hath done לָ֔נוּ אֶת־ <WH853> הָרָעָ֥ה <WH7451> evil הַגְּדוֹלָ֖ה <WH1419> us this great הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> But וְאִם־ <WH518> if לֹ֗א <WH3808> not וְיָדַ֙עְנוּ֙ <WH3045> but if not then we shall know כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֤א <WH3808> not יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> that [it is] not his hand נָ֣גְעָה <WH5060> [that] smote בָּ֔נוּ מִקְרֶ֥ה <WH4745> us it [was] a chance ה֖וּא <WH1931> it הָ֥יָה <WH1961> [that] happened to us לָֽנוּ׃

וַיַּעֲשׂ֤וּ <WH6213> did so הָאֲנָשִׁים֙ <WH376> the men כֵּ֔ן <WH3651> so וַיִּקְח֗וּ <WH3947> and took שְׁתֵּ֤י <WH8147> two פָרוֹת֙ <WH6510> kine עָל֔וֹת <WH5763> milch וַיַּאַסְר֖וּם <WH631> and tied בָּעֲגָלָ֑ה <WH5699> them to the cart וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH1121> their calves כָּל֥וּ <WH3607> and shut up בַבָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> at home

וַיָּשִׂ֛מוּ <WH7760> And they laid אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֥וֹן <WH727> the ark יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> on הָעֲגָלָ֑ה <WH5699> upon the cart וְאֵ֣ת <WH853> הָאַרְגַּ֗ז <WH712> and the coffer וְאֵת֙ <WH853> עַכְבְּרֵ֣י <WH5909> with the mice הַזָּהָ֔ב <WH2091> of gold וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> צַלְמֵ֥י <WH6754> and the images טְחֹרֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH2914> of their emerods

וַיִשַּׁ֨רְנָה <WH3474> took the straight הַפָּר֜וֹת <WH6510> And the kine בַּדֶּ֗רֶךְ <WH1870> way עַל־ <WH5921> in דֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <WH1870> to the way בֵּ֣ית שֶׁ֔מֶשׁ <WH1053> of Bethshemesh בִּמְסִלָּ֣ה <WH4546> the highway אַחַ֗ת <WH259> they הָלְכ֤וּ <WH1980> [and] went along הָלֹךְ֙ <WH1980> as they went וְגָע֔וֹ <WH1600> lowing וְלֹא־ <WH3808> and did not סָ֖רוּ <WH5493> and turned not aside יָמִ֣ין <WH3225> [to] the right hand וּשְׂמֹ֑אול <WH8040> or [to] the left וְסַרְנֵ֤י <WH5633> and the lords פְלִשְׁתִּים֙ <WH6430> of the Philistines הֹלְכִ֣ים <WH1980> went אַחֲרֵיהֶ֔ם <WH310> after עַד־ <WH5704> them גְּב֖וּל <WH1366> them unto the border בֵּ֥ית שָֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <WH1053> of Bethshemesh

וּבֵ֣ית שֶׁ֔מֶשׁ <WH1053> And [they of] Bethshemesh קֹצְרִ֥ים <WH7114> [were] reaping קְצִיר־ <WH7105> harvest חִטִּ֖ים <WH2406> their wheat בָּעֵ֑מֶק <WH6010> in the valley וַיִּשְׂא֣וּ <WH5375> and they lifted up אֶת־ <WH853> עֵינֵיהֶ֗ם <WH5869> their eyes וַיִּרְאוּ֙ <WH7200> and saw אֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣אָר֔וֹן <WH727> the ark וַֽיִּשְׂמְח֖וּ <WH8055> and rejoiced לִרְאֽוֹת׃ <WH7200> to see

וְהָעֲגָלָ֡ה <WH5699> And the cart בָּ֠אָה <WH935> came אֶל־ <WH413> into שְׂדֵ֨ה <WH7704> into the field יְהוֹשֻׁ֤עַ <WH3091> of Joshua בֵּֽית־ הַשִּׁמְשִׁי֙ <WH1030> a Bethshemite וַתַּעֲמֹ֣ד <WH5975> and stood שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> there וְשָׁ֖ם <WH8033> where אֶ֣בֶן <WH68> stone גְּדוֹלָ֑ה <WH1419> there where [there was] a great וַֽיְבַקְּעוּ֙ <WH1234> and they clave אֶת־ <WH853> עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> the wood הָעֲגָלָ֔ה <WH5699> of the cart וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַ֨פָּר֔וֹת <WH6510> the kine הֶעֱל֥וּ <WH5927> and offered עֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> a burnt offering לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD ס

וְהַלְוִיִּ֞ם <WH3881> And the Levites הוֹרִ֣ידוּ ׀ <WH3381> took down אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאַרְגַּ֤ז <WH712> and the coffer אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which אִתּוֹ֙ <WH854> in אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which בּ֣וֹ כְלֵֽי־ <WH3627> that [was] with it wherein the jewels זָהָ֔ב <WH2091> of gold וַיָּשִׂ֖מוּ <WH7760> [were] and put אֶל־ <WH413> about הָאֶ֣בֶן <WH68> stone הַגְּדוֹלָ֑ה <WH1419> [them] on the great וְאַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> and the men בֵֽית־ שֶׁ֗מֶשׁ <WH1053> of Bethshemesh הֶעֱל֨וּ <WH5927> offered עֹל֜וֹת <WH5930> burnt offerings וַֽיִּזְבְּח֧וּ <WH2076> and sacrificed זְבָחִ֛ים <WH2077> sacrifices בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> the same day הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

וַחֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <WH2568> And when the five סַרְנֵֽי־ <WH5633> lords פְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> of the Philistines רָא֑וּ <WH7200> had seen וַיָּשֻׁ֥בוּ <WH7725> [it] they returned עֶקְר֖וֹן <WH6138> to Ekron בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> the same day הַהֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he ס

וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> These טְחֹרֵ֣י <WH2914> emerods הַזָּהָ֔ב <WH2091> And these [are] the golden אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which הֵשִׁ֧יבוּ <WH7725> returned פְלִשְׁתִּ֛ים <WH6430> which the Philistines אָשָׁ֖ם <WH817> [for] a trespass offering לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD לְאַשְׁדּ֨וֹד <WH795> for Ashdod אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> one לְעַזָּ֤ה <WH5804> for Gaza אֶחָד֙ <WH259> one לְאַשְׁקְל֣וֹן <WH831> for Askelon אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> one לְגַ֥ת <WH1661> for Gath אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> one לְעֶקְר֥וֹן <WH6138> for Ekron אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> one ס

וְעַכְבְּרֵ֣י <WH5909> mice הַזָּהָ֗ב <WH2091> And the golden מִסְפַּ֞ר <WH4557> [according to] the number כָּל־ <WH3605> of all עָרֵ֤י <WH5892> of all the cities פְלִשְׁתִּים֙ <WH6430> of the Philistines לַחֲמֵ֣שֶׁת <WH2568> [belonging] to the five הַסְּרָנִ֔ים <WH5633> lords מֵעִ֣יר <WH5892> cities מִבְצָ֔ר <WH4013> [both] of fenced וְעַ֖ד <WH5704> against כֹּ֣פֶר <WH3724> villages הַפְּרָזִ֑י <WH6521> and of country וְעַ֣ד ׀ <WH5704> against אָבֵ֣ל <WH59> [stone of] Abel הַגְּדוֹלָ֗ה <WH1419> even unto the great אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which הִנִּ֤יחוּ <WH3240> whereon they set down עָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH5921> and אֵ֚ת <WH853> אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD עַ֚ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> [which stone remaineth] unto this day הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this בִּשְׂדֵ֥ה <WH7704> in the field יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> of Joshua בֵּֽית־ הַשִּׁמְשִֽׁי׃ <WH1030> the Bethshemite

וַיַּ֞ךְ <WH5221> And he smote בְּאַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH582> men בֵֽית־ שֶׁ֗מֶשׁ <WH1053> of Bethshemesh כִּ֤י <WH3588> because רָאוּ֙ <WH7200> because they had looked בַּאֲר֣וֹן <WH727> into the ark יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיַּ֤ךְ <WH5221> even he smote בָּעָם֙ <WH5971> of the people שִׁבְעִ֣ים <WH7657> and threescore and ten אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> the men חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> fifty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> men וַיִּֽתְאַבְּל֣וּ <WH56> lamented הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> and the people כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because הִכָּ֧ה <WH5221> had smitten יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> because the LORD בָּעָ֖ם <WH5971> [many] of the people מַכָּ֥ה <WH4347> slaughter גְדוֹלָֽה <WH1419> with a great

וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> said אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> the men בֵֽית־ שֶׁ֔מֶשׁ <WH1053> of Bethshemesh מִ֚י <WH4310> Who יוּכַ֣ל <WH3201> Who is able לַעֲמֹ֔ד <WH5975> to stand לִפְנֵ֨י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> LORD הָאֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> angels הַקָּד֖וֹשׁ <WH6918> this holy הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this וְאֶל־ <WH413> about מִ֖י <WH4310> Who יַעֲלֶ֥ה <WH5927> go מֵעָלֵֽינוּ׃ <WH5921> and ס

וַֽיִּשְׁלְחוּ֙ <WH7971> And they sent מַלְאָכִ֔ים <WH4397> messengers אֶל־ <WH413> to יוֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH3427> to the inhabitants קִרְיַת־ יְעָרִ֖ים <WH7157> of Kirjathjearim לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying הֵשִׁ֤בוּ <WH7725> have brought again פְלִשְׁתִּים֙ <WH6430> The Philistines אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD רְד֕וּ <WH3381> come ye down הַעֲל֥וּ <WH5927> [and] fetch it up אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> אֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH413> about
